data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, MacOS High Sierra 10.13.3
data.actual_result: The image gets bigger and smaller as you zoom in and out
data.expected_result: The background/rest of the app zooms, whilst the image stays the same size
data.short_description: When Zooming In Or Out, Any Focused Attached Image Zooms As Well.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any image from text chat - Zoom in - Zoom out
